name: The Beverly Hills Bali
address: 55RG+458, Jl. Goa Gong, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Great villa on top of the mountain. It's tranquil yet quite easy to get to the famous Melasti beach and Jimbaran.
Lots of convenience store and laundry nearby. But definitely need to rent vehicle when you stay here.
review 2:
Villas are acceptable I guess. The rooms and bathroom are in need of serious modernisation, but they are clean and comfortable. Wood work has termites. Gardening not done in 2 months. Pool area needs repair.
Would I stay here for a romantic holiday, probably not.
review 3: The service is very poor, the staff is not friendly, everywhere is very dirty and unkempt.
review 4: Exciting, that's really great üëçüèª, keep up a good work
review 5: Without a doubt the most hospitable and friendliest Villa I have ever stayed in Bali. The location is extremely close to some of the best beaches in Bali and the grounds are stunning. The management and staff treat you like family and are extremely helpful. I highly recommended the Beverly Hills Bali.

name: Pura Goa Gong
address: No.,, Jl. Goa Gong No.1, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Named after its location, Goa Gong, or Gong Cave, hidden high behind the bush with Hindu temple above via lager stairs. 2 enormous Buddha statues and 1 Ganesha statue on top.
review 3: Ancient heritage.. local wisdom can be seen here
review 4: Very sacred place and unique temple.
review 5: Never went inside. Just pass by  everyday

name: Villa Magna Bali
address: Jl. Goa Gong No.88, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Looks stylish from the first sight, but very inconvenient for living. There is another building villa just after the wall and it's very noisy because of it and also not safe because of workers.
There is also mold there and electricity problems, be careful.

By the way there is a nice view from it .
review 2: Worst villa we had in Bali. We've been living there for 2 months and always had trouble.  Extra slow wifi, electricity problems 10 times per day, mold everywhere after raining days, we even got robbed! And all of this for an extra high price, and they took part of our deposit at the end. Definitely not recommend
review 3: the place is beautiful and very strategic
review 4: Not recommended, uncomfortable and cheap villa.

name: Goa Gong Residence Jimbaran
address: Jl. Goa Gong No. 77, Banjar Anggaswara Batu Ngongkong, Jl. Goa Gong Residense pondok kayu sugih No.88, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Casa Bonita Villa Jimbaran
address: Gg. Casabonita, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80362, Indonesia
review 1: Wow, what an amazing place!! Left a lengthier review on Trip Advisor and thank you to the amazing staff at Casa Bonita Villa for our wonderful stay with friends. Cannot recommend highly enough, already looking forward to coming back again (and again!)
review 2: I have  a WOW Balinese experience staying at Casa Bonita Villa in Jimbaran.great location. Excellent room clean and airy. Very interesting display of Balinese arts all around the rooms. Lovely pool areas and fantastic view of the Wisnu Garuda Kencana.
review 3: This villa is so awesome, good to spend a whole day in the villa. Staff and managers are nice and friendly. Service is so good, they make our last minute bbq and all other last minute requests happens. Place is clean and tidy. Really with the price.
review 4: Diya and tari were super helpful. Service and quality üëç
review 5: Fantastic place... beautiful buildings.. awesome pool... amazzing views.. very friendly staff.. bedrooms with gorgeous views.. very close to GARUDA WISJNU KENTJANA Museum.. view to Bali Airport and Kuta Beach.. warm swimming pool and large living room

name: Asri Jewel Villas & Spa
address: Jl. Goa Gong, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80362, Indonesia
review 1: Only 4 stars because the restaurant has only small selection of food but other than that villa was awesome clean enough"Bali after all"  stayed with our toddler gotta keep close eye on kids as it's not really pool safe but hay look after your family and it's all good. Had my birthday there also got serprized with a cake and ALL the staff sang to me.,üëå Little things go along way. Would definitely stay again thanks
review 2: Big, clean! private pool for each villa and one bigger common pool. 2 showers one inside one outside .Staff is amazing, so nice and helpful. Definitely recommend for the price.
review 3: An amazing private pool Villa ....staffs are so helpful....clean and safe....a prefect place for couples to stay
review 4: Perfect place for couple especialy honeymooners. Spacious, authentic, private, great service.
review 5: So quiet place.. Don't forget to bring your own snack / food, coz far from minimarket ect

name: Sun Island Suites & Spa Goa Gong
address: 55VH+2HC, Jl. Goa Gong, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The place is massive, top notch comfortable bed and proper private pool. Staff is very friendly and helpful. The only thing taht could be improved is amenities like shower gel, shampoo etc. But other than that everything is absolutely exceeding our expectations! We will come back.
review 2: Spacious villa with private pool. Around 45mins drive from Seminyak ( with no traffic, 1.5 hr with traffic). Be careful, the road from the villa entrance to reception is very steep.
review 3: Friendly staff and very helpful. We ordered private dinner and they give it all at their best. Great services for great expenses, it's worth it.
review 4: Very nice and good villa. Freedom and privacy for those need away from the crowded.
review 5: Great staff, nice and secluded getaway, best to have a taxi app or scooter to get around.

name: The Lavana Villa Puri Hawila Jimbaran
address: Kutuh, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Great place for getaway. Far from noisy crowds. Spacious and elegant.
review 2:
Has the best view ever . Pool , room kitchen are clean. Really good for family . Clean room for sure
If you need more special pricre you can contact offline official sales 085745388678
review 3: Best view n comfortable.,get price at sales 6289531423796
review 4: Nice villas, clean and very beautiful view. Good venue for private event. üëçüòä
review 5: Love it, perfect view airport, highway cross the sea, light from the city, green of the farm village..

name: Bay View Kebabs
address: 55RG+MMM, Jl. Goa Gong, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
We really liked this place and have been here before. Even though there's a popular, cheaper kebab place nearby, we kept coming back because we enjoy the taste. However, today was a bit disappointing. We ordered mixed meat and salad with four sauces (garlic, tomato, BBQ, and mustard). In previous visits, they always asked if we wanted the sauces mixed or separate, but this time they didn't (and damn I forgot to mention also). Our order came with all the sauces mixed on the meat generously. When we mentioned it, they said it was because we didn't ask for them to be separated, which was partially true. I was just thinking if there were these options, they should be trained to ALWAYS ask the guests how they want the sauces served.

The meat tasted unenjoyable with all the sauces, and to make matters worse, the fries were excessively salty. We had to clean them one by one because they were covered in salt. I didn‚Äôt understand why they had the urge to add that much when they actually had salt on the table. If we wanted more, we could just add ourselves. Should have been just sprinkle of it. It was frustrating that they didn't ask or help when they saw the issue.

We finished the meal, paid, but there were no apologies, no smiles, no thank you. It was a memorable experience, but not in a good way.
review 2: The best place to eat on Jalan Goa Gong. Their kebabs are pretty good but I prefer their kebab plates. Also, seating is quite limited, most of their orders are for takeout.
review 3: This kebab place is a solid choice. The food is tasty, and the service is good. It's a dependable spot to satisfy your cravings for some delicious kebabs. I've enjoyed my visits here and would consider returning.
review 4:
We were just after something quick, cheap and easy that was near our room... We ended up VERY pleasantly surprised!! Everything was so fresh and full of flavour! Best! Kebab! I've ever had! I'm from Australia and I've had my fair share!
So delicious we will be back again for sure!! Thanks to the friendly team too üòÉ üëçüèº 210,000 for 2 huge meals for 2 people! What a great deal!!
review 5: Tried the kebab plate and a kebab wrap. Both tasted very good, the meat was well seasoned, fresh vegetables, good portions. Will definitely come again.

name: The Mahita Villa
address: 55VJ+259 Sun Island Suites, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Villa Okada
address: Tiara Nusa Estate, Jl. Goa Gong No.17B, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The room and the house were even better than the pictures shown... oyong and william were just the best host we have ever had. We went to bali for our wedding anniversary and i am glad this is the first house we stayed in coz it set us up for the reat of our trip.. the room walls are all glass overlooking the stunning south bali area....¬† The house location is from top of a hill overlooking the airport in front...jimbaran on left and nusa dua on the right... its the most stunning and strategic view of 3 main areas and yet away from the touristy crowd... kudos to host for mainting such beautiful house. The hosts are some of the most warm and fun people i have ever met. I am ONLY and ONLY staying in oyongs house in south bali for any future trips!!!
review 2: Really sweet place! Awesome view, high-quality accommodation! My personal highlight is the fauna, I'm in love with the geckos üòç
review 3: I love the design of this villa, its modren and clean, with fantastic landscape
review 4: Great house , minus all the cats ( yuck)
review 5: Lovely location swimming pool and wiew

name: The Laras
address: Jimbaran, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The perfect vacation in Bali. Stayed there for 2 nights, and then came back to stay a further night. Exclusive and pristine, with excellent service and cleanliness. The Laras was a great getaway from the hustle and bustle of life whilst being just a short trip away from the coastal cafes and bars. Totally enjoyed my time here especially due to the hospitality rendered by Sam and his staff. Highly recommend this place!
review 2: Amazing stay in a beautiful villa. Management and staff were the best - looking forward to returning already.

name: Villa Hammerhead
address: 55VJ+FCF, Kutuh, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Feels like heaven on Earth when u're here..
review 2: The amazing & incredible villa in goa gong area

name: Villa Kroeze
address: Jl.Melang Kaja No.47 Br.Kaja Jati, Kutuh, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Two new beautiful decorated villa‚Äôs across each other in green and tropical part of Bali where you can sleep across each other with the swimming pool and living as a central point. There‚Äôs a long table for dining and there is a big comfortabel sofa where you can chill and relax after a day exploring the neighborhood. There are some nice beaches close by the villa. Easy to travel by scooter of cab.
Perfect for one big familie or two families who wants to stay near to each other but also have their own personal space. There are two big king size beds in one villa. They are also very comfortable. The host and his wife are very friendly they their hospitality is without limits. They will make sure you are in good hands and there is nothing more to wish for, thank you Marcel and Christien.
review 2:
I‚Äôve stayed there few times!!The villa is new!! Very clean and quiet,if you wanna avoid traffic and noise,it‚Äôs definitely the place you‚Äôre looking for!!
And only 10min drive to Pandawa beach!!
The owner is very helpful and sweet and friendly!!
review 3: I loved our stay at Villa Kroeze! Its a beautiful place with very friendly and helpful owners. The wooden houses are very authentic and comfortable and the pool is amazing. I would definitely want to come back and stay here again!
review 4:
We had such a great time at Villa Kroeze!! The houses were so lovely&cosy and the kids didn‚Äôt want to leave the pool :)
The owners were very sweet and helpful. We saw amazing beaches at a short distance from the houses. Definitely want to go back!
review 5: A lovely place to stay with your family. Big family room where you can cook and enjoy eating or just relax in the sitting area. Around the pool 2 comfortable bungalows each with 2 double beds. You can jump straight in the pool. :) Child friendly.

name: Villa Celah
address: 55RG+PRX, Jl. Goa Gong, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Where do I even start.

This is probably the worst accomodation experience I have ever had.

Before we even arrived‚Ä¶
We booked through airbnb, the host said we could not stay due to maintenance that would take 1 month, then when confronted by airbnb about refunding us took back what they said so we could not cancel.

Check in‚Ä¶
They completely lied and scammed us. The place was filthy, the pool green with algae. Absolutely disgusting. Whist we were madly trying to rebook accomodation both a cleaner and a pool person turned up agreeing with the place being disgusting.

The manager then called us asking us (2 adults and a baby) to leave the property immediately when we were trying to organise alternate accommodation as it was getting later and later into the evening.

DO NOT BOOK HERE! There is many alternate, well run places in a better location.
review 2: This villa is not recommended! The first day, we went there then the swimming pool was not ready yet to use and the water was not that pure. The walls were so bad, the electricity was not functioned well. In the midnight, there was no water at all and I was that panic coz I need water for washing face and pee. It LITERALLY NEEDS good maintenance, yet the view was that good in the morning and night. For us and for this villa with these conditions, it was called overpriced
review 3: We booked this villa and were told that we could pay during our stay. They then charged our credit card for the full amount and are refusing to refund it after many requests. We now have to dispute the transaction with our bank. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND that people don't book this villa. They lack any form of ethics.
review 4: Not for Rent in current condition. Need renovation and cleaning. Villa is offered for sale. Very modern architecture in very rural environment. For very specific type of users, no Land atxall, very minimalistic House
review 5: The best experiemce! Tom, the manager, was really helpful. Clean and modern rooms :)

review 2: Beautiful location with waterfall and surrounding mountains,  Great food and staff

name: Warung Puncak Goa Gong
address: 55RG+MP5, Jl. Goa Gong, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Secret Gem.. Fantastic panoramic night city light view at warung prices.. N sadly poor tasting 15@k mie ayam but the warm 8k rup lemonade is cool..
review 2:
I ordered mie ayam bakso.
It was not as I expected..
With the same price (20,000) I can get more delicious meatball. This one is only a powder mixed with flavouring powder. I don't think the lady made it by herself..
While the view.. Well, it's really nice maybe for only have a drink coffee/ tea/ or coconut or snacks (they sell so many kind of snacks)..
review 3: There is adorable view from this place, kind personal, all is simple. Here you can drink whole fresh coconut and order local food.
review 4: Traditional small food stall, an Oasis to stopby just as refreshment point during the trip.
review 5: Since I'm in high school, but recent visit was disappointment. No more chicken noodle, and charging an instant noodle extensively.
